//: All dinos over 23 kg should have a zombie version to zombify into
description: The shuffling corpse of a medium-sized dinosaur with sharp teeth and two prominent bony crests on its head, with ragged strips of ripped flesh hanging down like a frill.
This zombie is enormous, scaly, and studded with bony spikes; it moves with horrible speed.  Its colorful horns are worn and wet with filth and its bright scales and bone spikes have taken a beating.
Enormous putrid dinosaur corpse with a ferocious crocodile-like head, oozing black eyes, and a tattered sail on its back.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5000 L and 5000 kg
description: Putrid dinosaur corpse with a large head, long sharp teeth, oozing black eyes, and a long tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1700 L and 1700 kg
description: The shambling corpse of a large predatory bipedal dinosaur with a mouth full of sharp serrated teeth.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: The shambling corpse of a huge, bipedal dinosaur predator, with a tall ridge running down the length of its back covered with heavy muscles.  Its teeth are curved and serrated like sawblades.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: The shambling corpse of a huge, bipedal dinosaur predator with long claws and strong arms for grappling.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1500 L and 1500 kg
description: Large jaws drooling black liquid lifted over a shuffling dinosaur corpse.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1500 L and 1500 kg
description: Massive jaws drooling black liquid lifted over a huge shuffling dinosaur corpse.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: Massive jaws drooling black liquid lifted over a huge shuffling dinosaur corpse.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2000 L and 2000 kg
description: Massive jaws drooling black liquid, lifted over grasping claws by a huge shuffling dinosaur corpse.
Massive, long jaws drooling black liquid, lifted by a huge but shuffling dinosaur corpse.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1500 L and 1500 kg
description: Huge jaws with long sharp teeth drooling black liquid over white feathers, lifted by a huge but shuffling dinosaur corpse.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: Huge jaws with long sharp teeth drooling black liquid, lifted by a huge but shuffling dinosaur corpse.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 8500 L and 8500 kg
description: Massive piles of ragged, stinking flesh lifting enormous sharp teeth.

//: Special monster for Old Guard questline
description: A massive dinosaur corpse with enormous teeth wrapped with heavy chains to allow some control.
The shuffling corpse of a medium-sized bipedal dinosaur, covered with tattered feathers and black, putrid liquid.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: The shuffling corpse of a huge bipedal dinosaur covered with tattered feathers and black putrid liquid.  Long claws protrude from its hands.
The shuffling corpse of a large-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with tattered feathers and black putrid liquid.  Sharp curved claws protrude from its hands.
The shuffling corpse of a large bipedal dinosaur covered with tattered feathers and black putrid liquid.  Long claws protrude from its hands.
The shuffling corpse of a medium-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with tattered feathers and black putrid liquid.  Both feet brandish a large sickle-like claw.
The swaying, hopping corpse of a large bipedal dinosaur with feathered arms, a long tail, and long, sharp scythe-like claws.
Long-necked, two-legged dinosaur corpse with a long tail.
Long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse.  The neck is bent at a disturbing angle and leaking black ichor.
Large, long-necked, two-legged dinosaur corpse with a long tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 12500 L and 12500 kg
description: Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a long tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with two parallel rows of tall spines down its neck and back and a whip-like tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 20000 L and 20000 kg
description: A massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a long, whip-like tail.  The head is still upright and the neck looks like it would still make a good, strong club.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 15000 L and 15000 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a bulky torso and a long, whip-like tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 15000 L and 15000 kg
description: Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a long, whip-like tail and a tiny head with vacant white eyes.  Sways and staggers.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 16000 L and 16000 kg
description: Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a long, whip-like tail.  There is a large claw on each foreleg.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 47000 L and 47000 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a long, whip-like tail.  The head is still upright and the neck looks like it would still make a good, strong club.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 40000 L and 40000 kg
description: Gigantic, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse with longer forelegs and a whip-like tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 70000 L and 70000 kg
description: Gigantic, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur corpse, protected by natural bone armor and a spiked tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3170 L and 3800 kg
description: A large, shambling quadruped dinosaur corpse, dragging with the weight of the plates on its back - waving a much livelier-looking spiked tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2900 L and 3500 kg
When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1575 L and 1900 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur corpse has a long tail, a beak, and large shoulder spikes.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.
This lightly armored four legged dinosaur corpse has a rigid spiked tail, a beak, and sturdy spikes along the sides.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur corpse has a beak, a long tail, and long wicked-looking spikes jutting out of the neck.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2900 L and 3500 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur corpse has a beak and large bony plates covering the back.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1330 L and 1600 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur corpse has a lumpy armored head with a beak and thick plates protecting the cheeks, thick back armor, and small short spikes along the sides.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 3000 kg
description: This heavily-armored dinosaur corpse is covered with small ridged bony plates with long, bony spikes.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2000 L and 2500 kg
description: This four-legged armored dinosaur corpse has horns on the head and large spikes in rows along the back and side.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This armored dinosaur corpse looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo.  Its tail ends in a spiked club of bone.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5000 L and 6000 kg
description: The shuffling corpse of a four legged dinosaur with peeling armored plates, a beak, and black, glistening eyes.  Its tail ends in a massive spiked club of bone.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur corpse has a horny beak, two bony rings protecting the neck, and a long tail ending in a heavy club of bone.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur corpse has several long spikes along the back and a long spiked tail ending in a club of bone.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.
The shuffling corpse of a feathered dinosaur with a long broad tail and a beak.  Its tattered feathers are stained with black, sticky liquid.
The shuffling corpse of a large, feathered, bipedal dinosaur with strong legs, broad shoulders, and a pointed beak.  Its tattered feathers are stained with black, sticky liquid.
The shuffling corpse of a large, feathered, bipedal dinosaur with strong legs, broad shoulders, and a pointed beak.  Its tattered feathers are stained with black, sticky liquid.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A bulky, beaked dinosaur, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge, mottled dinosaur with hooves and a heavy tail, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.  Has a flat beak, thick nose, and a small but spiky head crest.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: A huge, mottled dinosaur with hooves and a heavy tail, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.  Has a flat beak and a nose with a prominent nasal arch.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A huge, mottled dinosaur with hooves, a short beak and a tall head crest, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A huge, mottled dinosaur with hooves, a broad beak and a spiky head crest, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5500 L and 5500 kg
description: A huge, scaly dinosaur with a broad, toothless beak, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge, mottled dinosaur with a blunt head crest, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A huge, scaly dinosaur with a long stiff tail, hooves, a narrow beak and a tall head crest, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge, scaly dinosaur with a short beak and a tall head crest, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge, scaly dinosaur with a tall ridge down the back, a tail, hooves, a short beak and a wide, rounded head crest, dead but walking, eyes vacant and swollen.
The shuffling corpse of a medium-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with tattered feathers and black, putrid liquid.  It resembles a reptilian ostrich with a hard-looking domed head.

//: Special monster for Old Guard questline
description: A feathered dinosaur corpse with a domed head with heavy chains to allow some control.
A shambling dinosaur corpse with a bony crest and sharp beak able to walk on two legs and four.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.
A massive, shambling, four-legged dinosaur with a tall thin bony head crest, two long brow horns, and a beak.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2200 L and 2200 kg
description: A massive, shambling, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a bony crest with several long spikes and one large horn above the beak and a short tail.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2200 L and 2200 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a beak and long horn above the nose.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1300 L and 1300 kg
description: A massive, shambling, four-legged dinosaur corpse with a tall bony crest and one large horn above the nose curving forward towards the beak.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a tall bony crest with two long curved spikes and three rough bosses above the eyes and nose as well as a short tail and hooked beak.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3500 L and 3500 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with two massive bony bosses on its brow and nose.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1750 L and 1750 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a tall bony crest from which three short horns emerge above the eyes and beak.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a tall, bony crest from which four long horns and a short nose horn emerge.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1200 L and 1200 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a bony crest and two wavy side horns.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5000 L and 5000 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a tall, bony crest from which two wicked-looking horns emerge.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 7000 L and 7000 kg
description: A massive, shambling, rhino-like dinosaur corpse with a bony crest from which three wicked-looking horns emerge.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.
A shambling, two-legged dinosaur corpse with strong arms and a toothy beak.  Its eyes ooze black, putrid tears.
The ragged but flying corpse of a large, feathered reptile with a long, pointy, toothless beak and a long, pointy head crest.
The ragged but flying corpse of a large, feathered reptile with a long, pointy, toothless beak and a long, rigid neck.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 10000 L and 10000 kg
description: The ragged bloated corpse of a huge aquatic dinosaur the size of a house, with a crocodile-like head and swimming fins.
A small, four-legged, herbivorous dinosaur juvenile's corpse that could be from a number of different species.
The corpse of a small, four-legged, herbivorous dinosaur juvenile, with cracked bone armor plates.
